statements: DELETE FROM network_slicing WHERE service_id = 101 AND slice_type = 'low_latency';
DELETE FROM network_slicing WHERE slice_type = 'high_throughput' AND resource_allocation > 500;
DELETE FROM network_slices WHERE slice_name = 'Slice 1' AND service_type = 'Type A';
DELETE FROM resource_allocation WHERE service_id = 1 AND allocated_capacity < 100
DELETE FROM user_subscription WHERE slice_id = 50 AND expiration_date <= '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM 5g_subscribers WHERE service_id IN (SELECT service_id FROM network_slicing_services WHERE resource_allocation > 100);
